recipesJson.name: O.D.C. (Ol' Dirty Custard) a.k.a. RYC4
recipesJson.author: robolto78
recipesJson.description: Formally known as RYC4. I was wanting an RY4/custard, and I wanted to use some flavors I hadn't used in a while. This is great of the shake, but it shines after about  a week. I like to make about 120 mls of this and vape through the steep. I hope you enjoy.
